oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:title: Country Music Hall of Fame Volume 2 - Side 2
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:description: The recording is of a variety of recorded performances. The performances were gathered for the Columbia Special Products: Country Music Hall of Fame Volume 2. The recordings are from an unidentified number of dates and gathered on October 07, 1966. The tape is the second tape of two.
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:creator: Buck Owens; Hank Williams; Webb Pierce; Loretta Lynn; Lefty Frizzell; Ray Price; George Jones; Rex Allen; Jimmy Rodgers; Flatt and Scruggs; Grandpa Jones; Kitty Wells
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dcterms:tableOfContents: (00:00) Together Again (Buck Owens) -- (02:24) Lovesick Blues (Hank Williams) -- (05:08) More And More (Webb Pierce) -- (07:21) The Other Woman (Loretta Lynn) -- (09:51) I Love You 1,000 Ways (Lefty Frizzell) -- (11:24) City lights (Ray Price) -- (13:31) White Lightning (George Jones) -- (15:23) Don't Go Near the Indians (Rex Allen) -- (18:26) Mule Skinner Blues (Jimmy Rodgers) -- (20:17) Foggy Mountain Special (Flatt and Scruggs) -- (21:47) T For Texas (Grandpa Jones) -- (23:42) Amigos Guitar (Kitty Wells)
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:subject: Owens, Buck, 1929-2006; Williams, Hank, 1923-1953; Williams, Hank, 1923-1953. I saw the light; Pierce, Webb; Pierce, Webb, 1921-1991; Lynn, Loretta; Lynn, Loretta, 1932-; Frizzell, Lefty, 1928-1975; Price, Ray, 1926-2013; Jones, George; Jones, George, 1931-2013; Allen, Rex, 1920-1999; Allen, Rex, 1947-; Rodgers, Jimmie, 1897-1933; Rodgers, Jimmie, 1933-; Flatt and Scruggs and the Foggy Mountain Boys (Musical group); Jones, Grandpa, 1913-1998; Wells, Kitty;
